code: import React,{Component}from'react';import List from'./List';import{DropdownButton,MenuItem}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class FilteredList extends Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.onSearch=event=>{this.setState({search:event.target.value.toLowerCase()});};this.onFilter=event=>{this.setState({type:event});};this.filterItem=item=>{return item.name.toLowerCase().search(this.state.search)!==-1&&(this.state.type==="All"||item.type===this.state.type);};this.state={search:"",type:"All"};}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search",onChange:this.onSearch}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DropdownButton,{title:this.state.type,id:"dropdown-basic",onSelect:this.onFilter,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{eventKey:"All",children:"All"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{eventKey:"Fruit",children:"Fruit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{eventKey:"Vegetable",children:"Vegetable"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(List,{items:this.props.items.filter(this.filterItem)})]});}}export default FilteredList;
